#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int **map;

int main()
{
	int r, c;
	cin >> r >> c;
	map=new int*[r+1];
	for(int i=1; i<=r; i++)
		map[i]=new int[c+1];
	for(int i=1; i<=r; i++)
	{
		for(int j=1; j<=c; j++)
		{
			cin >> map[i][j];
		}
	}
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int x1, x2, x3, x4, y1, y2, y3, y4, sum=0;
		cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x4 >> y4;
		x2=x1;
		x3=x4;
		y2=y4;
		y3=y1;
		if(x1==x4)
		{
			for(int i=y1; i<=y4; i++)
			{
				sum+=map[x1][i];
			}
		}
		else
		{
			//cout << "x1 " << x1 << " x2 " << x2 << " x3 " << x3 << " x4 " << y4<< "y1 " << y1 << " y2 " << y2 << " y3 " << y3 << " y4 " << y4;
			for(int i=x1; i<=x3; i++)
			{
				for(int j=y1; j<=y2; j++)
				{
			//		cout << i << " " << j << "\n";
					sum+=map[i][j];
				}
			}
		}
		cout << sum << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
